question: Can one pray the Ishraaq or Chasht Salaats on the Day of Eid (before the Eid prayer)? How about to make up the missed Fajr Salaat?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
On the day of eid, it is not permissible to perform the Ishraaq or Chasht
Salaats before the Eid Salaat. As for the missed Fajr Salaat, it will be
permissible to perform the salaat before the eid salaat, however, it will be
preferrable to perform it after the eid salaat. (Shaami vol. 2 pg. 160-171,
H.M. Saeed).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
